posts.post_content: Looking to buy some raw or lower graded T206 with interesting stamped backs.  I've picked up a few nice examples, would like to add to my collection.   Have less interest in date stamps, as opposed to more unique examples.  Thanks

I have eleven with stamped backs [names and icons], ungraded, ranging from P-VG.  They include a Sovereign 350 and a hall-of-famer [Griffith batting].

Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] if you'd like to see scans/get prices.

I too collect stamped-backs, so if you have any in G or better to trade let me know.

I'm actually looking for the back stamp below.  If you ever come across any, please keep me in mind.  I have six so far...and in case you can't tell, it's a policeman holding a night stick.
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20170522/81b4c4429b4d6929f8ee2ca2ff6fca29.jpg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Have you guys ever visited my T206 back stamp project?  There is a link in my signature below.  I'd be happy to add any images I don't already have if any of you would be willing to contribute.  Let me know what you think in a private message.

Thanks,

AndyH
I'm selling a Hindu Lloyd Bolton stamp back on EBay right now. Goes off in a day
All emails and messages responded to.  Thank you.  Still looking for any offers if you have a unique stamped T206 example.

A few deals completed.  Bumping this to see if anyone else has stamped backs they wouldnt mind parting with.  Toytown stamp, police officer stamp are two I still lack from my collection, but looking at any unique stamp.  Thanks.

Love the backstamped cards. How about embossed though?  

Sold this one a while back and then bought it back.  Great card and really cool!

Good luck on the hunt....

[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/t206/0E1528CA-3EDB-404D-8E5C-8A3880838ED2.jpg[/IMG]

Definitely a cool card!  Any idea what the mold is?  Congratulations on getting it back!
